title: @ngrx/data
contents:
mode_edit code
API

@ngrx/datalink

Entry pointslink

Primarylink

@ngrx/data

Primary entry point exportslink

NgModuleslink

EntityDataModule

entity-data main module includes effects and HTTP data services Configure with forRoot. No forFeature yet.
EntityDataModuleWithoutEffects

Module without effects or dataservices which means no HTTP calls This module helpful for internal testing. Also helpful for apps that handle server access on their own and therefore opt-out of @ngrx/effects for entities

Classeslink

ChangeSetItemFactory

Factory to create a ChangeSetItem for a ChangeSetOperation
ClearCollections

Clear the collections identified in the collectionSet.
CorrelationIdGenerator

Generates a string id beginning 'CRID', followed by a monotonically increasing integer for use as a correlation id. As they are produced locally by a singleton service, these ids are guaranteed to be unique only for the duration of a single client browser instance. Ngrx entity dispatcher query and save methods call this service to generate default correlation ids. Do NOT use for entity keys.
DataServiceError

Error from a DataService The source error either comes from a failed HTTP response or was thrown within the service.
DefaultDataService

A basic, generic entity data service suitable for persistence of most entities. Assumes a common REST-y web API
DefaultDataServiceConfig

Optional configuration settings for an entity collection data service such as the DefaultDataService<T>.
DefaultDataServiceFactory

Create a basic, generic entity data service suitable for persistence of most entities. Assumes a common REST-y web API
DefaultHttpUrlGenerator
DefaultLogger
DefaultPersistenceResultHandler

Default handling of responses from persistence operation, specifically an EntityDataService
DefaultPluralizer
EntityActionFactory
EntityActionGuard

Guard methods that ensure EntityAction payload is as expected. Each method returns that payload if it passes the guard or throws an error.
EntityCacheDataService

Default data service for making remote service calls targeting the entire EntityCache. See EntityDataService for services that target a single EntityCollection
EntityCacheDispatcher

Dispatches Entity Cache actions to the EntityCache reducer
EntityCacheEffects
EntityCacheReducerFactory

Creates the EntityCacheReducer via its create() method
EntityChangeTrackerBase

The default implementation of EntityChangeTracker with methods for tracking, committing, and reverting/undoing unsaved entity changes. Used by EntityCollectionReducerMethods which should call tracker methods BEFORE modifying the collection. See EntityChangeTracker docs.
EntityCollectionCreator
EntityCollectionReducerFactory

Create a default reducer for a specific entity collection
EntityCollectionReducerMethods

Base implementation of reducer methods for an entity collection.
EntityCollectionReducerMethodsFactory

Creates {EntityCollectionReducerMethods} for a given entity type.
EntityCollectionReducerRegistry

Registry of entity types and their previously-constructed reducers. Can create a new CollectionReducer, which it registers for subsequent use.
EntityCollectionServiceBase

Base class for a concrete EntityCollectionService. Can be instantiated. Cannot be injected. Use EntityCollectionServiceFactory to create.
EntityCollectionServiceElementsFactory

Creates the core elements of the EntityCollectionService for an entity type.
EntityCollectionServiceFactory

Creates EntityCollectionService instances for a cached collection of T entities in the ngrx store.
EntityDataService

Registry of EntityCollection data services that make REST-like CRUD calls to entity collection endpoints.
EntityDefinitionService

Registry of EntityDefinitions for all cached entity types
EntityDispatcherBase

Dispatches EntityCollection actions to their reducers and effects (default implementation). All save commands rely on an Ngrx Effect such as EntityEffects.persist$.
EntityDispatcherDefaultOptions

Default options for EntityDispatcher behavior such as whether add() is optimistic or pessimistic by default. An optimistic save modifies the collection immediately and before saving to the server. A pessimistic save modifies the collection after the server confirms the save was successful. This class initializes the defaults to the safest values. Provide an alternative to change the defaults for all entity collections.
EntityDispatcherFactory

Creates EntityDispatchers for entity collections
EntityEffects
EntityHttpResourceUrls

Known resource URLS for specific entity types. Each entity's resource URLS are endpoints that target single entity and multi-entity HTTP operations. Used by the DefaultHttpUrlGenerator.
EntitySelectors$Factory

Creates observable EntitySelectors$ for entity collections.
EntitySelectorsFactory

Creates EntitySelector functions for entity collections.
EntityServices

Class-Interface for EntityCache and EntityCollection services. Serves as an Angular provider token for this service class. Includes a registry of EntityCollectionServices for all entity types. Creates a new default EntityCollectionService for any entity type not in the registry. Optionally register specialized EntityCollectionServices for individual types
EntityServicesBase

Base/default class of a central registry of EntityCollectionServices for all entity types. Create your own subclass to add app-specific members for an improved developer experience.
EntityServicesElements

Core ingredients of an EntityServices class
HttpUrlGenerator

Generate the base part of an HTTP URL for single entity or entity collection resource
LoadCollections

Create entity cache action that loads multiple entity collections at the same time. before any selectors$ observables emit.
Logger
MergeQuerySet

Create entity cache action that merges entities from a query result that returned entities from multiple collections. Corresponding entity cache reducer should add and update all collections at the same time, before any selectors$ observables emit.
PersistanceCanceled

Persistence operation canceled
PersistenceResultHandler

Handling of responses from persistence operation
Pluralizer
SaveEntities
SaveEntitiesCancel
SaveEntitiesCanceled
SaveEntitiesError
SaveEntitiesSuccess
SetEntityCache

Create entity cache action for replacing the entire entity cache. Dangerous because brute force but useful as when re-hydrating an EntityCache from local browser storage when the application launches.

Functionslink

PropsFilterFnFactory

Creates an {EntityFilterFn} that matches RegExp or RegExp string pattern anywhere in any of the given props of an entity. If pattern is a string, spaces are significant and ignores case.
createEmptyEntityCollection
createEntityCacheSelector
createEntityDefinition
defaultSelectId

Default function that returns the entity's primary key (pkey). Assumes that the entity has an id pkey property. Returns undefined if no entity or id. Every selectId fn must return undefined when it cannot produce a full pkey.
excludeEmptyChangeSetItems

Return ChangeSet after filtering out null and empty ChangeSetItems.
flattenArgs

Flatten first arg if it is an array Allows fn with ...rest signature to be called with an array instead of spread Example:

// See entity-action-operators.ts const persistOps = [EntityOp.QUERY_ALL, EntityOp.ADD, ...]; actions.pipe(ofEntityOp(...persistOps)) // works actions.pipe(ofEntityOp(persistOps)) // also works
getGuid

Alias for getUuid(). Compare with getGuidComb().
getGuidComb

Creates a sortable, pseudo-GUID (globally unique identifier) whose trailing 6 bytes (12 hex digits) are time-based Start either with the given getTime() value, seedTime, or get the current time in ms.
getUuid

Creates a Universally Unique Identifier (AKA GUID)
guidComparer
makeErrorOp

Make the error EntityOp corresponding to the given EntityOp
makeSuccessOp

Make the success EntityOp corresponding to the given EntityOp
normalizeRoot

Remove leading & trailing spaces or slashes
ofEntityOp
ofEntityType
toUpdateFactory

Return a function that converts an entity (or partial entity) into the Update<T> whose id is the primary key and changes is the entity (or partial entity of changes).

Structureslink

ChangeSet
ChangeSetAdd
ChangeSetDelete
ChangeSetOperation
ChangeSetUpdate
ChangeSetUpsert
ChangeState

Change state for an entity with unsaved changes; an entry in an EntityCollection.changeState map
ChangeType

Types of change in a ChangeState instance
CollectionSelectors

The selector functions for entity collection members, Selects from the entity collection to the collection member Contrast with {EntitySelectors}.
EntityAction

Action concerning an entity collection.
EntityActionDataServiceError

Payload for an EntityAction data service error such as QUERY_ALL_ERROR
EntityActionOptions

Options of an EntityAction
EntityActionPayload

Payload of an EntityAction
EntityCache
EntityCacheAction
EntityCacheCommands

A collection's cache-only commands, which do not update remote storage **
EntityCacheQuerySet

Hash of entities keyed by EntityCollection name, typically the result of a query that returned results from a multi-collection query that will be merged into an EntityCache via the MergeQuerySet action.
EntityChangeTracker

Methods for tracking, committing, and reverting/undoing unsaved entity changes. Used by EntityCollectionReducerMethods which should call tracker methods BEFORE modifying the collection. See EntityChangeTracker docs.
EntityCollection

Data and information about a collection of entities of a single type. EntityCollections are maintained in the EntityCache within the ngrx store.
EntityCollectionDataService

A service that performs REST-like HTTP data operations for an entity collection
EntityCollectionReducerMethodMap

Map of {EntityOp} to reducer method for the operation. If an operation is missing, caller should return the collection for that reducer.
EntityCollectionReducers

A hash of EntityCollectionReducers
EntityCollectionService

A facade for managing a cached collection of T entities in the ngrx store.
EntityCollectionServiceElements

Core ingredients of an EntityCollectionService
EntityCollectionServiceMap

A map of service or entity names to their corresponding EntityCollectionServices.
EntityCommands

Commands that dispatch entity actions for a collection
EntityDataModuleConfig
EntityDefinition
EntityDefinitions
EntityDispatcher

Dispatches EntityCollection actions to their reducers and effects. The substance of the interface is in EntityCommands.
EntityMetadata

Metadata that describe an entity type and its collection to @ngrx/data
EntityMetadataMap

Map entity-type name to its EntityMetadata
EntityOp

General purpose entity action operations, good for any entity type
EntityPluralNames

Mapping of entity type name to its plural
EntitySelectors

The selector functions for entity collection members, Selects from store root, through EntityCache, to the entity collection member Contrast with {CollectionSelectors}.
EntitySelectors$

The selector observable functions for entity collection members.
EntityServerCommands

Commands that update the remote server.
HttpResourceUrls

Resource URLS for HTTP operations that target single entity and multi-entity endpoints.
MergeStrategy

How to merge an entity, after query or save, when the corresponding entity in the collection has unsaved changes.
QueryParams

A key/value map of parameters to be turned into an HTTP query string Same as HttpClient's HttpParamsOptions which is NOT exported at package level https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/22013
RequestData
UpdateResponseData

Data returned in an EntityAction from the EntityEffects for SAVE_UPDATE_ONE_SUCCESS. Effectively extends Update with a 'changed' flag. The is true if the server sent back changes to the entity data after update. Such changes must be in the entity data in changes property. Default is false (server did not return entity data; assume it changed nothing). See EntityEffects.

Typeslink

ChangeSetItem

A entities of a single entity type, which are changed in the same way by a ChangeSetOperation
ChangeStateMap

Map of entity primary keys to entity ChangeStates. Each entry represents an entity with unsaved changes.
ENTITY_CACHE_META_REDUCERS
ENTITY_CACHE_NAME
ENTITY_CACHE_NAME_TOKEN
ENTITY_CACHE_SELECTOR_TOKEN
ENTITY_COLLECTION_META_REDUCERS
ENTITY_METADATA_TOKEN
EntityCacheSelector
EntityCollectionReducer
EntityFilterFn

Filters the entities array argument and returns the original entities, or a new filtered array of entities. NEVER mutate the original entities array itself.
HttpMethods
INITIAL_ENTITY_CACHE_STATE
OP_ERROR

"Error" suffix appended to EntityOps that have failed.
OP_SUCCESS

"Success" suffix appended to EntityOps that are successful.
PLURAL_NAMES_TOKEN
changeSetItemFactory

Instance of a factory to create a ChangeSetItem for a ChangeSetOperation
entityCacheSelectorProvider
persistOps
